content: **how tall is the dragon** dragon is 16 to 18 inches tall if you use the yarn and hook suggested in the supplies list **options** i ve given instructions for a fiercer looking dragon or a sleepy more friendly looking dragon i ve included a video tutorial for removable fire **written pattern** found on my blog amigurumi to go here 1 **video tutorial** there are 14 parts on youtube that will take you through each section of the dragon including stuffing shaping and assembly and fire i ve left nothing out all the links you need are in one post here 2 **yarn and color codes** the green dragon is made with red heart comfort yarn emerald 3233 the bluish looking one is red heart comfort yarn peacock 3193 red one is 2 rolls of red heart super saver in cherry red the comfort yarn comes in jumbo rolls one of those rolls is more than enough to make one dragon **english** i put everything you need for the original english version as i designed it here 3 **danish** with a huge thanks to christina stjernholm this pattern and many more has been translated to danish here 4 scroll down the page **french** thanks to nyantillie the pattern has been translated to french here 5 **german** thanks to gaby lerhbach the pattern is available in german drachen häkelanleitung hier 6 1 http //www amigurumitogo com/2016/06/dragons-in-my-kitchen-free-pattern-with html 2 http //www amigurumitogo com/2016/06/dragons-in-my-kitchen-free-pattern-with html 3 http //www amigurumitogo com/2016/06/dragons-in-my-kitchen-free-pattern-with html 4 http //www amigurumitogo com/2015/06/danish-amigurumi-patterns-translation html 5 http //amigurumibynyantillie eklablog com/dragons-by-sharon-ojala-a126454272 6 http //www amigurumitogo com/2017/08/drachen-hakelanleitung html
